attributes.action: Allow postmen and women to start deliveries earlier than the present time 10am
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Royal Mail is stopping it's delivery workers from starting deliveries until 10am. The strikes would not be happening if they were allowed to deliver earlier. Whatever happened to posties delivering between 6:45am and 10am? Instead, posties now post between 10am and 2pm. We want our mail early.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
